text: Protein sequences of all reviewed viral proteins were downloaded from Uniprot database vailable at: http://www.uni prot.org/ [Accessed 20 September 2016]. xLIR and WxxL patterns for these proteins were identified using the approach suggested previously. 27, 28 For a given protein, information related to the start and end of LIR pattern, actual LIR sequence, PSSM score (Position specific scoring matrix), similar LIRCPs and presence or absence xLIR and WxxL in intrinsically disordered region were obtained.
